articles.description: Xavier Tillman gets the ball in the paint and finishes with a two-handed slam.
articles.headline: Tillman has one final throwdown

articles.description: Freshman Jacob Epperson scored a season-high 15 points and Marcus Foster added 12 points and eight rebounds to help Creighton beat Division II Bemidji State 94-46 on Tuesday night.
articles.headline: After slow start, Creighton overpowers D-II Bemidji State

articles.description: Hunter Rhodes had 12 points and Bennett Koch added 10 as Northern Iowa held Evansville scoreless in the final two minutes to secure a 47-41 win on Tuesday night.
articles.headline: Northern Iowa wins it at FT line, beating Evansville 47-41

articles.description: Jared Terrell had 17 points and 16th-ranked Rhode Island extended its winning streak to 16 games with an 85-67 victory over Richmond on Tuesday night.
articles.headline: No. 16 URI streak reaches 16 with 85-67 win over Richmond

images.caption: Jared Terrell gets the lob from Jeff Dowtin and slams it home with two hands for the Rams.
images.name: URI's Terrell climbs ladder for alley-oop

articles.description: Donta Hall receives a lob  from half court and tips in the basket with a defender all over him.
articles.headline: Alabama's Hall cant not be stopped

images.caption: Donta Hall receives a lob  from half court and tips in the basket with a defender all over him.
images.name: Donta Hall receives a lob  from half court and tips in the basket with a defender all over him.

articles.description: Kevin McKay came off the bench to score a career-high 33 points and hit several big shots down the stretch to help Central Michigan pull away late for an 80-72 victory over Northern Illinois on Tuesday night.
articles.headline: McKay sparks Central Michigan past Northern Illinois 80-72
